content.html: Software companies aren't made of code. They're made of processes that produce and maintain code. And the foremost component of these processes are people. The code is just a by-product. More of a liability than an asset.
content.value:
Software companies aren't made of code. They're made of processes that produce and maintain code. And the foremost component of these processes are people.

The code is just a by-product. More of a liability than an asset.
